text: Joseph "Joe" Grech (9 February 1934 - 30 December 2024) was a Maltese singer. He was born in Cospicua, Malta. He was best known for introducing the Maltese language to the 1971 Eurovision Song Contest, the first appearance from Malta on this pan-European television event. Grech died on 30 December 2024 at the age of 90.Joe Grech, Malta's first Eurovision singer, dies aged 90 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Maltese singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Joe Grech
